name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Third Edition
name_original: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Third Edition
description:
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Third Edition is a game developed by ImageBuilder Software and Valleycrest Productions. It was originally released in 2001. Buena Vista Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Third Edition on PC.
